title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 29 April 2014 - XWiki
content:

11:23 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
11:37 <vmassol> tmortagne: is it normal that I get this build error:  
11:37 <vmassol> https://gist.githubusercontent.com/vmassol/11395374/raw/d3b2f0701d2f52e5478705e12c4620563b53e370/gistfile1.txt  
11:37 <vmassol> ?  
11:37 <tmortagne> vmassol: pull  
11:38 <vmassol> I build only oldcore  
11:38 <vmassol> so it should have retrieved a new version normally  
11:38 <vmassol> \*built  
11:38 <tmortagne> the issue is with oldcore  
11:38 <vmassol> ok :)  
11:38 <tmortagne> checkstyle decided to start chcking proerties files and oldcore translations are pretty big  
11:39 <tmortagne> so I excluded them  
12:30 <gdelhumeau> Guys, I'll be off for the rest of the day  
12:30 <gdelhumeau> see you tomorow :)  
12:31 <vmassol> tomorrow morning only right?  
12:31 <vmassol> have fun  
12:32 <gdelhumeau> yes :)  
12:32 <gdelhumeau> thanks!  
12:33 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
13:09 <UCC> has quit  
13:10 <unknown\_\_> has quit  
13:56 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
14:40 <vmassol> mflorea: do you think you could look at http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-10283 quickly since it looks like a blocker for 6.0?  
14:41 <mflorea> vmassol: I'm working on http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-10268 right now, I'll take a look at the WYSIWYG issue later  
14:41 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
14:41 <vmassol> ok thanks  
14:52 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
14:56 <spu7nic> has quit  
14:58 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
15:23 <cjd> happy 1398777777 second  
15:24 <cjd> oh, happens every 9 days :)  
15:45 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
15:57 <andreeapopescu> has quit  
16:02 <evalica> has quit  
16:07 <msmeria> has quit  
16:28 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
16:39 <JuanDaugherty> has joined #xwiki  
16:39 <JuanDaugherty> I used Xwiki a couple years ago, I forget if it works with Jboss or not, seem to remember not.  
16:40 <JuanDaugherty> iirc has its own delivery setup maybe with maven  
16:56 <vmassol> JuanDaugherty: it should work fine but you need to configure jboss to not leak :) See http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationJBoss  
16:56 <vmassol> (leak = jboss classloader isolation issues)  
16:57 <JuanDaugherty> vmassol, got it thx, mainly was wondering if grails was in jboss  
16:57 <vmassol> grails? what's the relationship with xwiki? :)  
16:57 <JuanDaugherty> not using it anymore?  
16:58 <JuanDaugherty> oh, now it's comming back  
16:58 <JuanDaugherty> I was using grails with xwiki but xwiki doesn't use it  
16:58 <vmassol> nope, but we use groovy  
17:00 <JuanDaugherty> and groovy then I take it is in jboss  
17:00 <vmassol> possibly  
17:00 <vmassol> I didn't get any issue with that last time I tried xwiki in jboss though (AFAIR)  
17:00 <JuanDaugherty> any big changes in last couple of years?  
17:00 <vmassol> I'm not a jboss user but I tested it a while back to ensure xwiki was working fine  
17:01 <vmassol> sure, we progress a lot ;)  
17:01 <JuanDaugherty> (in xwiki generally)  
17:01 <vmassol> biggest underneath change is probably the extension manager/distribution wizard  
17:01 <vmassol> you could check the release notes starting with the last version your used  
17:01 <vmassol> they're supposed to be summary of big changes  
17:01 <JuanDaugherty> ah, OK  
17:02 <vmassol> and they're supposed to be nice to read :)  
17:02 <vmassol> http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/  
17:02 <JuanDaugherty> :)  
17:02 <vmassol> solr search is a big one too  
17:02 <vmassol> built in multiwiki support too  
17:03 <JuanDaugherty> ah that's of value  
17:03 <vmassol> basically we folded XEM into XE  
17:05 <JuanDaugherty> jboss is a convenient 1-stop app server, easy to skirt RHs entanglements
